text: We doing a basketball bracket this year?
And also - I didn’t realize until today that Portland was hosting this year…   could be fun to go to a game on that first thursday of the tournament.
i can try to re-boot the ESPN one from last year.
I went the last time it was in Portland. It was ok. UW was playing and I went with a Husky, so, maybe that was why.
Right, It would totally depend on who is playing I guess.  Each “session” is two games right?   so tickets for “session 1” would be like 1pm - 5pm with two back to back games, right?
I'd be down for checking out a game. And yeah we should do a pool.
Duke over Kentucky all the way.
yes. that's how it was for us. we had tickets to 1 session, but most people had tickets for the whole day
it's weird, they kick everyone out, and then everyone has to come back in
I wonder if the Zags will be in PDX
Let's see who we draw, but I think we probably find a session we'd be into. Are there any hoops clients that need some attention?
the pac-12 tournament is streaming right now on <http://www.pac-12.com>

attachments.title: Pac-12
attachments.text: Pac-12 Networks and the Pac-12 Conference, a leader in collegiate athletics that is made up of 12 of the most prestigious universities in the world.
